newsitem.title: USA: MBIA qualifies 12 muni issues for bond insurance.
newsitem.headline: MBIA qualifies 12 muni issues for bond insurance.

text.p: MBIA Insurance Corp. said Tuesday it qualified for bond insurance the following 12 municipal issues scheduled for competitive sale today:
--Columbus Building Authority, Ga., $9.35 million lease revenue bonds.
--Knoxville, Iowa, $1.875 million GO corporate purpose bonds.
--Broome County, N.Y., $28.875 million public improvement bonds.
--Northport Union Free School District, N.Y., $6.945 million improvement bonds.
--Victor Central School District, N.Y., $13.455 million GO school district bonds.
--Angelina County, Texas, $3.1 million tax and solid waste disposal bonds.
--Montgomery County Municipal Utility District No. 67, $1.42 million water and sewer bonds.
--Pierce County, Wash., $12.32 million GO refunding bonds.
